DOC.brief_summary: Background : Functional dyspepsia ( FD ) one commonest digestive disorder . The pathophysiology functional dyspepsia uncertain . Risk factor include genetics , gender , age , helicobacter pylorus infection , etc . However , report association genetic contribution development FD mood disorder . Indication : Functional dyspepsia patient Study center ( ) : Prince Wales Hospital , Hong Kong Aims : - To evaluate genetic factor development functional dyspepsia & common mood disorder - To evaluate genetic factor severity function dyspepsia & mood disorder - To develop diagnostic test classification functional dyspepsia plasma ghrelin serotonin expression - To collect sleep data future use - To save blood sample future retrospective diagnostic genetic examination Study design : Case-control cross sectional study Number subject : Total 1200 subject ( 300 FD patient + 300 relative FD patient FDR ) ( 300 Controls + 300 FDR ) Patient population : Functional dyspepsia patient age 18-60 Duration study : 1 May 2012 - 30 April 2013 Primary variable ( ) : Genetic polymorphism target gene , plasma ghrelin serotonin expression Secondary variable ( ) : FD global symptom assessment symptom score Number visit : 1 Hypotheses : - Shared genetic factor contribute development FD common psychological disorder - FD patient contribute suppression plasma ghrelin serotonin expression compare healthy control

DOC.detailed_description: Methods : All subject participate ( 1 ) Demographic assessment , ( 2 ) Questionnaires administration ( 3 ) Blood sample collection . The three step must complete within 2 week . 1 . Demographic assessment - Demographic : age , gender - Anthropometric measurement : body mass index , height , weight - Smoke drink habit - Comorbidity medical history 2 . Questionnaires administration - A combined functional gastrointestinal ( GI ) symptom questionnaire ( FGISQ ) base recall past 7 day use assessment GI symptom include regurgitation , heartburn , epigastric pain , postprandial fullness , abdominal pain , diarrhea , constipation etc . All question use 4-point ( 0-3 ) Likert scale . - FGI Screening Questionnaire ( v.3 , 20101011 ) screen functional gastrointestinal disorder accord Rome III criterion . The questionnaire incorporate GERD diagnostic questionnaire GERDQ ( Chinese version ) - Hospital Anxiety Depression Scale ( HADS ) self administer scale seven cover depression seven cover anxiety . - Psychological disorder : Patient Health Questionnaire ( PHQ ) use screen concomitant psychological disorder depression generalize anxiety disorder . - The Epworth Sleepiness Scale , Pittsburgh sleep quality index , General Sleep Quality Questionnaire collect sleep data future use . 3 . Blood sample collection - Up 20 ml fast blood sample collect study aim 1-4 . - Fasting glucose test perform FD patient - Serology test Hp status perform healthy volunteer FDRs Subjects fast glucose test serology test perform within one year study enrollment exempt repeat test refuse repeat test . In case , previous test result record used study . If subject find positive result Helicobacter pylorus ( Hp ) serology test , referral letter prescription suggestion give subject seek proper medical care primary care set . In current practice , Hp eradication mandatory asymptomatic subject . Laboratory work : Nine ml blood use detection biomarkers functional dyspepsia single nucleotide polymorphism ( SNPs ) . The genotyping DNA isolated whole blood sample ( FlexGene DNA kit , Qiagen ) . High-throughput genotyping perform serotonin 3A receptor polymorphism ( rs1062613 ) ghrelin CLOCK 3111C polymorphism ( rs1801260 ) . It analyze Applied Biosystems ( ABI ) 3730xl DNA Analyzer . Six ml blood use detection plasma ghrelin serotonin expression development diagnostic test classification functional dyspepsia ELISA .
